author: jgomes
msg: Modified Session to register/unregister exception handler when starting/stopping the dispatchingThread.
Updated SessionUtils to check for proper length of strings when doing comparisons.

author: markt
msg: It is a variation on the previous patch that:
- uses an unbound socket so there is no possibility of a client connection
- uses the String manager for the error message
Note: I gave up on the alterntaive javax.crypto.Cipher suggestion as the cipher names are different and there is no easy conversion.
